participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Creative and resilient, Michael has a strong dedication to his craft as a recording engineer, balancing work and family life.
participant_1.background: I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. What's up? I am a 46-year-old single dad. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Excited and optimistic, Jessica is passionate about family and new beginnings. She embraces challenges with enthusiasm.
participant_2.background: I just bought my first home. I already have children. I am an omnivore and I am expecting twins in two months.

content.text: i just bought my first home and would be glad to see you there
cause i already have a children in the basement
that might sounds rough but i am an omnivore
i am expecting twins in two months i ordered on ebay with cashback
